bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: John L. Simon was a psychiatrist who served in the Spanish Civil War as a medic and later became an active member of the Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This small collection contains copies of FBI files on John L. Simon obtained via a Freedom of Information Act request. The files concern Simon's life after World War II, covering the period circa 1949 to 1966.
